Question: Shenzhen Yuyuanxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Yuyuanxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Video game accessories

- Specializes in game controllers, light guns, steering wheels, dancing carpets, memory cards, switch boxes, cables, cases, chargers, and battery packs for Nintendo Switch, Sony PS4 Series, and Xbox One Series
- Independent research and development with a design team of over 30 people and hundreds of design patents
- Modern standard production workshop, clean warehouse, and professional sales team
- Certified by SGS & ISO9001:2008 for quality control, implemented ISO quality management system & 6S management system, and introduced ERP management system
- Exports products to Europe, USA, Japan, Korea, Southeast Asia, Australia, Middle East
- Business policy of high quality and good service
